mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OA_LEAVE( id, org, name, approver, type, description, beginTime, endTime, pId, account_id, createTime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{org}, #{name}, #{approver}, #{type}, #{description}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{pId}, #{account_id}, #{createTime} )
